snippet: Holder’s announcement is only a first step.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Vanita Gupta, deputy legal director at American Civil Liberties Union, contends Atty Gen Eric H Holder Jr's statement that the federal government will commit to reducing the bloated prison population will have a very limited immediate impact; holds nation must look to the states, where most criminal defendants are sentenced, to have a lasting national impact.
lead_paragraph: Holder’s announcement is only a first step.

headline.main: How to Really End Mass Incarceration
headline.print_headline: How to Really End Mass Incarceration
